text:
Nutshell #77: Eating in 6 hours and #fasting for 18 hours can lead to increased #stress resistance and #longevity, as well as decreased incidence of diseases, including #cancer and #obesity.

@HopkinsMedicine in @NEJM
Article: https://t.co/DSwXCsXvCl
